# Alexey Panfilov (Dzarlax) - Product Manager Portfolio

> Data-driven product leader with 8+ years guiding mobile & web innovation. Fusing deep analytics with UX intuition and AI-powered development to ship intuitive, high-impact features. Thrive in fast-evolving environments, turning customer insights and OKRs into clear roadmaps and measurable outcomes.

This portfolio website showcases professional experience, technical skills, and achievements in product management, UI/UX design, and technology innovation. Currently serving as Senior Product Manager at Constructor.tech, with previous experience at Yandex Cloud and Yandex.Market.

## Professional Profile

- [Professional Experience](https://dzarlax.dev/experience.md): Detailed work history including roles at Constructor.tech, Yandex Cloud, Yandex.Market, and other technology companies
- [Technical Skills](https://dzarlax.dev/skills.md): Comprehensive list of technical proficiencies including Product Management, UI/UX, AI & Development, and Data Analysis
- [Education & Certifications](https://dzarlax.dev/education.md): Academic background and professional certifications

## Contact & Social

- [LinkedIn Profile](https://linkedin.com/in/alexey-panfilov): Professional network and connections
- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/dzarlax): Open source projects and code repositories
- Email: Available through contact form on website
